H0.text: Mount Godwin-Austen is better known by which name. Mount Chhogori

H1.text: Mount Godwin-Austen is better known by which name. Savage Mountain

H2.text: Mount Godwin-Austen is better known by which name. Mount Baltoro

H3.text: Mount Godwin-Austen is better known by which name. K2

A4.text: The surveyor's mark, K2, therefore continues to be the name by which the mountain is commonly known.

A5.text: K2 became known as the Savage Mountain after George Bell—a climber on the 1953 American expedition—said, 'It's a savage mountain that tries to kill you.'
